TextView.android:text: Department of Architecture was established in the year 1983-84. Existing intake of the department is 80. Celebrated its Silver Jubilee in the year 2009. Our Alumni are spread throughout the Globe holding various positions at various capacities.
Creating socially responsive and technically sound architects, who cater to the needs of the Building Industry and Society both at local and global level in achieving sustainable environment.
To enable the student to acquire technical skills and knowledge to serve the industry and society.
To keep upgrading the teaching and learning process with possible latest technology and innovative ideas to deliver the knowledge and skills.
To encourage consultancy, research and development programs for delivering and acquiring latest technology and knowledge, to serve the society and building industry.
Achieving over all development and placement through interaction with Alumni, building industry and other institutes.
P D A College of Engineering, Kalaburagi.
Automatic weather Station with Data Logger
Movie Camera - Sony HI8 Handy Cam
Administrative Incharge in Dept. of Architecture
BOE, Over all development of the Department
Student Registration, Professional Training, Climatology Lab
